content.prompt: Complete the code for the class Truck. You have to implement all the accessor and mutator (get/set) methods for each of these 5 attributes. Finally, you have to implement the methods load and unload for modifying the currentLoad attribute as needed (validating that currentLoad cannot be lower than zero when unloading and cannot be greater than maxCapacity when loading). More instructions on how to implement the missing parts of this class are provided in the code below.

uses.used_by: Jordan Barria, Jordan Barria - University Of Pittsburgh

uses.context_name: Java: CMIS 2200 | Application Programming II > Module 2- Objects and Classes
